mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT title,data_id,nickname,username,t1.create_date,'wz' type FROM `dts_record` t1 inner join uts_author t2 on t1.author_id = t2.author_id inner join dts_article t3 on t1.data_id = t3.article_id union SELECT title,data_id,nickname,username,t1.create_date,'sp' type FROM `dts_record` t1 inner join uts_author t2 on t1.author_id = t2.author_id inner join dts_video t3 on t1.data_id = t3.video_id ) t order by create_date limit 30
